metadata.title: CVE-2017-18926 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: raptor_xml_writer_start_element_common in raptor_xml_writer.c in Raptor RDFSyntax Library 2.0.15 miscalculates the maximum nspace declarations for theXML writer, leading to heap-based buffer overflows (sometimes seen inraptor_qname_format_as_xml).

criterions.comment: raptor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
raptor2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
